# Unlocking the true power of CRISPR for molecular detection.
Our breakthrough platform enables ultra-rapid molecular detection of highly multiplexed analytes, delivering unparalleled accuracy without the need for target amplification.
![Background gradient image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fe06b998ab5f81e1a49c45/6614852fbb053f9d2f9e9d94_Section%2001%20-%20Header.svg)
The CRISPR Cascade™
## A Universe of Possibilities
Introducing the CRISPR Cascade™, a revolutionary new molecular detection platform that delivers ultra-rapid, accurate results without the need for target amplification. The Cascade employs engineered CRISPR enzymes to specifically detect a molecular target of interest and then rapidly amplify the signal in a positive feedback loop, and scalable to highly multiplexed formats. With an unprecedented combination of speed, accuracy, and scalability, the CRISPR Cascade offers vast application potential for molecular detection.
### Ultra-rapid results
Activation begins with specific detection of a nucleic acid target that results in a positive signal amplification feedback loop, producing analytical reaction times in mere minutes.
### Massive multiplexingcapability
Unlike PCR or other DNA/RNA amplification technologies, the CRISPR Cascade enables high performance, highly scalable and rapid assays, while allowing pooling of multiple targets within reactions, akin to a molecular switch, allowing for massive multiplexing.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fe06b998ab5f81e1a49c45/662855b823c0fd87e670a7ab_radial-circle.svg)![RNP1 - a CRISPR-associated CAS enzyme](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fe06b998ab5f81e1a49c45/66351dcf60690bf6c7dcf1a5_RNP1%20Parallax%2001%20copy.webp)![RNP1 - a CRISPR-associated CAS enzyme](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fe06b998ab5f81e1a49c45/66351dcf60690bf6c7dcf1a5_RNP1%20Parallax%2001%20copy.webp)
### Target amplification-free molecular detection
The combined use of engineered CRISPR enzymes, blocked sequences, and reporter molecules generates robust signal without target amplification.
### Rapid reprogrammingfor new targets
With a generally applicable signal amplification for DNA or RNA, rapid product development can be achieved with simple target sequence selection and optimization.
[Learn More](https://www.vedabio.com/</technology>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fe06b998ab5f81e1a49c45/66147ea62b8b6c7bed319082_semi-circle-star.svg)
![Vedabio team members collaborating in a laboratory environment](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fe06b998ab5f81e1a49c45/6614878ccbcc6c4f8c70da13_our-company-1.png)
![VedaBio scientists working together in the lab](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65fe06b998ab5f81e1a49c45/665de4af839941a0eb0f28f7_Lab%20Photo%20Treatment%2001.webp)
With our team of industry leading experts, we operate at the forefront of scientific innovation to push the limits of what’s possible in the field of molecular detection.
[Learn More](https://www.vedabio.com/</about-us>)

generated_description:
**VedaBio: Redefining Diagnostics with CRISPR Technology**

VedaBio is a San Diego-based biotechnology company revolutionizing the way we understand and diagnose diseases through its innovative CRISPR-powered diagnostics. Founded in 2021 as part of the Y Combinator Batch S21, VedaBio is on a mission to deliver rapid, accurate diagnostic results—often in just minutes. The company employs a unique platform known as the **CRISPR Cascade™**, which enables highly multiplexed analyte detection without the cumbersome target amplification typically seen in traditional methods.

### The CRISPR Cascade™: Innovation at its Core

The CRISPR Cascade™ is a groundbreaking platform that leverages engineered CRISPR enzymes to detect specific molecular targets. What sets VedaBio apart is its ability to provide ultra-rapid results through a positive signal amplification feedback loop, allowing for reaction times in mere minutes. This means that patients can receive comprehensive diagnostic insights during a single doctor visit, a game-changer in how healthcare operates.

Key advantages of the CRISPR Cascade™ include:

- **Speed**: Analytical turnaround times are reduced to less than one minute.
- **Massive Multiplexing**: Capable of pooling multiple targets within a single reaction, unlike conventional PCR methods.
- **Target Amplification-Free Detection**: It eliminates the need for amplification steps, increasing accuracy and reliability.

### The Team and Trajectory

With a talented team of 30 employees led by industry veterans, VedaBio is pushing the boundaries of molecular detection. Notable appointments to their leadership include Randy Rasmussen, former CEO of BioFire Diagnostics, and G. Brett Robb as Senior Scientific Director and Head of CRISPR Science, both poised to steer the strategic focus of the company.

### Company Growth and Vision

Since its inception, VedaBio has harnessed substantial financial backing, launching with over $40 million aimed at transforming molecular diagnostics. The company not only envisions enhancing current diagnostic practices but also aims to explore a wide array of applications in the medical field.

In summary, VedaBio isn't just another biotech company; it's a promise of quick, precise diagnostics that could redefine patient experiences and outcomes in healthcare. Interested to learn more about this emerging player in the biotechnology space? Visit [VedaBio's website](https://www.vedabio.com) for additional insights.
